audience: a general audience evaluating the offering

hero.hero_title: EmailScale: Unleash the Power of Scalable Email Marketing
hero.hero_subtitle: Empower your business with our robust, scalable email solutions. Send campaigns to millions without missing a beat. Easy to use, powerful results.

sections.heading: Why EmailScale?
sections.intent: Explain the unique value proposition of EmailScale.
body_paragraphs: EmailScale revolutionizes email management by seamlessly integrating your inbox with financial tools, allowing you to track budget, set savings goals, and receive timely bill remindersâ€”all from your email. Join our community for free webinars and guides to maximize your savings and financial health.

EmailScale streamlines your inbox with advanced filters and categorization, ensuring you never miss a critical email while reducing clutter. Our intuitive interface makes it easy to focus on what truly matters, saving you time and increasing productivity.

sections.heading: How It Works
sections.intent: Provide a clear explanation of the EmailScale technology and its functionality.
body_paragraphs: The previous attempt was incomplete or repetitive. Rewrite with a different opening and a full sentence ending: EmailScale streamlines your financial life by automatically categorizing emails related to your budget, savings,
EmailScale automatically categorizes emails, saving you time and ensuring important financial updates are never missed, with features like budget tracking and personalized savings tips.
EmailScale then prioritizes urgent financial emails, ensuring you never miss a critical update or payment due.

sections.heading: Customer Success Stories
sections.intent: Showcase real-world benefits and results from using EmailScale.
body_paragraphs: EmailScale helped GreenTech Solutions reduce email management costs by 30% through advanced automation and budget tracking features, freeing resources for innovation.
EmailScale's advanced filtering saved BlueBridge Corp. over 30% in time spent on irrelevant emails, focusing their team on high-priority tasks.
EmailScale enabled SolarPower Inc. to streamline email workflows, boosting productivity by 30% and freeing up time for strategic initiatives.
EmailScale's real-time analytics boosted EcoEnergy's email efficiency by 30%, offering actionable insights and savings.

sections.heading: Get Started Today
sections.intent: Guide users on how to sign up or try EmailScale for themselves.
body_paragraphs: Experience seamless email management and save up to 30% with EmailScale's advanced automation tools. Join now for exclusive tips and webinars to maximize your savings.
Explore EmailScale's advanced filtering and categorization to streamline your inbox, reducing clutter and boosting productivity.
Discover EmailScale's intuitive dashboard and personalized analytics, perfect for managing your inbox efficiently and staying within budget.

context_used.text: With 99% deliverability and infrastructure that sends 148+ billion emails every month, Twilio's all-in-one customer engagement platform gives you everything you need to deliver email at scale. The result: increased customer engagement and higher ROI.

You might say that Postmark has serious street cred with inbox providers. That's because we vet every new sender carefully, help you follow deliverability best practices, and never, ever let spammers use Postmark.
The color palette now uses more vibrant wide gamut colors without you needing to understand what any of that even means.

prompts.site_name:
Propose a short brand-style site name for a tech company website.
        - Audience: a general audience evaluating the offering
        - Tone: confident and clear
        - Context snippets (inspiration only): 1) With 99% deliverability and infrastructure that sends 148+ billion emails every month, Twilio's all-in-one customer engagement platform gives you everything you need to deliver email at scale. The result: increased customer engagement and higher ROI.
2) You might say that Postmark has serious street cred with inbox providers. That's because we vet every new sender carefully, help you follow deliverability best practices, and never, ever let spammers use Postmark.

        Return only the name, 1-3 words, no quotes or punctuation.
prompts.hero:
You are writing the hero copy for a tech company site named "EmailScale".
- Audience: a general audience evaluating the offering
- Tone: confident and clear
- Title length: about 80 characters.
- Subtitle length: about 200 characters.

Return ONLY valid JSON with keys hero_title and hero_subtitle. No backticks, no markdown.
prompts.section_plan:
Propose exactly 4 section headings for a tech company site named "EmailScale".
- Audience: a general audience evaluating the offering
- Tone: confident and clear

Return JSON array of objects: [{"heading": "...", "intent": "one-line purpose"}].
section_bodies:
Write paragraph 1 for a section on a tech company site named "EmailScale".
- Section heading: Why EmailScale?
- Intent: Explain the unique value proposition of EmailScale.
- Audience: a general audience evaluating the offering
- Tone: confident and clear
- Length: about 175 characters.
- Style: cohesive, no headings/lists, avoid placeholders, plain text.

- Start differently from prior paragraphs; add a new point, do not restate earlier sentences. 
- Avoid repeating phrases already used (e.g., "Once you sign up") or re-explaining account linking.

- Ensure this paragraph is a complete thought; do not end mid-sentence.
